text: Focus on the Family (FOTF, or FotF) is an American evangelical group. The non- profit organization was founded in 1977 by James Dobson, and is based in Colorado Springs, Colorado. They have started several ministries, such as Adventures in Odyssey, and Focus on the Family Action. == Other websites == *Focus on the Family official website Category:1977 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Colorado
title: Focus on the Family
